scripts.start:1: npm run build && PORT=4001 nodemon dist/app.js
scripts.start:2: npm run build && PORT=4002 nodemon dist/app.js
scripts.start:3: npm run build && PORT=4003 nodemon dist/app.js
scripts.start:4: npm run build && PORT=4004 nodemon dist/app.js
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:1" "npm run start:2" "npm run start:3" "npm run start:4"
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch "**/*.ts" --ext ts --ignore node_modules --ignore dist --exec "npm run build && npm run start:all"
